wikitext.*:
[[File:Ted_Nasmith_-_The_Nazgûl.jpg|thumb|''The Nazgûl'' by [[Ted Nasmith]].]]
The '''Window of the [[Eye of Sauron|Eye]]''' was a window in the topmost tower of [[Barad-dûr]].<ref>{{HM|UI}}, p. 615</ref> It faced westwards in the direction of [[Mount Doom]].<ref>{{RK|Doom}}, p. 942</ref> It is possible that it was one of the windows from which [[Sauron]] gazed on the northwestern lands of [[Middle-earth]].
